responsibilities: Lead the design and development of generative AI models for 3D content creation.
Work with platforms like Blender, Unity, and Unreal Engine to integrate AI-driven solutions.
Build pipelines for realistic textures, materials, and animation generation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, artists, and game developers to ensure seamless implementation of AI capabilities.
Drive innovation in generative AI technologies to optimize workflow and improve gaming experiences.
Mentor junior engineers and foster a culture of technical excellence.
qualifications: Strong background in generative AI models such as Stable Diffusion or similar frameworks.
Experience with texture/material generation for 3D assets.
Expertise in 3D modeling tools and pipelines (Blender, Unity, Unreal Engine, etc.).
Solid understanding of computer vision applications in gaming.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, C++, or similar.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed are heavily focused on generative AI models, specifically for 3D content creation. The responsibilities include leading the design and development of generative AI models, integrating AI-driven solutions with platforms like Blender, Unity, and Unreal Engine, and driving innovation in generative AI technologies. The skills required include a strong background in generative AI models such as Stable Diffusion, experience with texture/material generation for 3D assets, and expertise in 3D modeling tools and pipelines. These elements clearly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI (GenAI). There is no mention of language models or tasks typically associated with Large Language Models (LLMs), such as natural language processing or text generation.
